name: Doodle Devil: 3volution
overview: The Power of Destruction is in Your Hands!Embrace Your Dark Side with Doodle Devil! While Doodle God was busy creating the universe, Doodle Devil was also having some fun. The same addictive, puzzle game play that made Doodle God a hit is back but with an evil twist. Discover the seven deadly sins and watch as the world crumbles at your fingertips as you create thousands of dastardly deeds. Combine fire, earth, wind & air to create demons, beasts, zombies... and much more. Being bad has never been so much fun! * Mold the combinations of fire, earth, wind and air. * Demon Mode! Fight against the most dangerous archdemons. * Devil Slots! Test youк sinful luck. * Hundreds of interesting, funny and thought-provoking quotes and sayings.
